channel.title: Projects on Jack Greenberg
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Jack Greenberg

item.title: NEATO Gauntlet
item.description: QEA presents NEATO: The Gauntlet Jack Greenberg Click here to watch the final video.The Challenge The objective of this task is to get the NEATO to navigate a playpen–“The Gauntlet”–until it reaches the “Barrel of Benevolence” (a cylinder), while avoiding boxes. The NEATO will utilize its LIDAR scanner to process its surroundings with a RANSAC algorithm to generate a potential field and perform a gradient descent path-finding method. The Hero The NEATO is a differential drive, two-wheeled robot that was simulated using a series group of docker containers, and interfaced with using the ROS (Robotic Operating System).

item.title: I2C2
item.description: I wrote an implementation of the I2C protocol (inter-integrated chip) in C. The project was partly for my Software Systems class, and partly for the Olin Electric Motorsports team.
